assignments.description: Adds the Applicant records to the ApplicantId collection variable and assigns the values for the fields in the Applicant record.
assignments.name: AddApplicantRecords
assignments.label: Add Applicant Records

assignments.description: Sets different fields of the applicant record and stores them in a collection.
assignments.name: AssignApplicantFromLead
assignments.label: Assign Applicant From Lead

assignments.description: Assigns the ID of the Party Profile record returned from the CreatePartyProfile element to the PartyProfileId variable, and then sets the stage of the Applicant record in the ApplicantId record variable to In Review.
assignments.name: AssignPartyProfileIdAndSetStage
assignments.label: Assign Party Profile ID and Set Stage

assignments.description: Assigns the ID of the Party Profile record returned from the CreatePartyProfile2 element to the ReturnedPartyProfileId variable, and then sets the stage of the Applicant record in the ApplicantId record variable to In Review.
assignments.name: AssignPartyProfileIdAndSetStage2
assignments.label: Assign Party Profile ID and Set Stage

assignments.description: Assigns the ID of the Party Profile record returned from the CreatePartyProfile3 element to the PartyProfileId variable, and then sets the stage of the Applicant record in the ApplicantId record variable to In Review.
assignments.name: AssignPartyProfileIDAndSetStage3
assignments.label: Assign Party Profile ID and Set Stage

assignments.description: Assigns the ID of the Party Profile record returned from the CreatePartyProfile element to the PartyProfileId variable, and then sets the stage of the Applicant record in the ApplicantId record variable to Approved.
assignments.name: AssignPartyProfileIdAndSetStage4
assignments.label: Assign Party Profile ID and Set Stage

assignments.description: When an error occurs during the flow execution, sets the isFlowFailed variable to True and stores the error message in the errorMessage variable.
assignments.name: SetFlowToFailed
assignments.label: Set Flow to Failed

assignments.description: Sets the IsFlowFailed variable to True if no record was returned from the GetLead element.
assignments.name: SetNullFlowFailed
assignments.label: Set Flow to Failed

value.stringValue: We couldn’t find any Lead record for the Application Form. Try again later or ask your Salesforce Admin for help.

assignments.description: When an error occurs during the flow execution, sets the isFlowFailed variable to True and stores the error message in the errorMessage variable.
assignments.name: SetNullFlowFailed2
assignments.label: Set Flow to Failed

value.stringValue: We couldn’t find any application form to initiate the onboarding. Try again later or ask your Salesforce Admin for help.

assignments.description: Assigns the value of the HasAdditionalApplicants variable based on the user’s input in the AddAdditonalApplicants element.
assignments.name: SetVariablesToAddAdditionalApplicants
assignments.label: Set Variables to Add Additional Applicants

assignments.description: Stores the values of the Application Form Product fields in variables.
assignments.name: StoreApplicationFormProduct
assignments.label: Store Application Form Product

decisions.description: Checks if the AddAdditionalApplicants variable is set to True.
decisions.name: AreAdditionalApplicantsNeeded
decisions.label: Are Additional Applicants Needed?

decisions.description: Determines if GetActivePartyProfile element returned any records.
decisions.name: AreThereActivePartyProfiles
decisions.label: Are There Active Party Profiles?

decisions.description: Determines whether the applicant that the user selects in the AddApplicants element is an existing customer.
decisions.name: IsApplicantExistingCustomer
decisions.label: Is Applicant an Existing Customer?

decisions.description: Checks if the stage of the Application Form record is set to Initiated.
decisions.name: IsApplicationFormStageInitiated
decisions.label: Is the Application Form Stage Set to Initiated?

decisions.description: Checks if the GetApplicationForm element returned a record.
decisions.name: WasApplicationFormRecordReturned
decisions.label: Was the Application Form Record Returned?

decisions.description: Checks if the GetLeadRecord element returned a record.
decisions.name: WasTheLeadRecordReturned
decisions.label: Was the Lead Record Returned?

Flow.interviewLabel: B2B Onboarding Sample: Initiate Application Form Onboarding {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: B2B Onboarding Sample: Initiate Application Form Onboarding

recordCreates.description: Creates an Account record for the applicant if the applicant isn’t an existing customer.
recordCreates.name: CreateAccount
recordCreates.label: Create Account

recordCreates.description: Creates Applicant records for records in the ApplicantsRecordCollection variable.
recordCreates.name: CreateApplicant
recordCreates.label: Create Applicant

recordCreates.description: Create Application Form Product record based on the user selection in the SelectApplicationFormProduct element.
recordCreates.name: CreateApplicationFormProduct
recordCreates.label: Create Application Form Product

recordCreates.description: Creates a Flow Orchestration Instance Related Object with Party Profile as the RelatedObject and status as In Progress.
recordCreates.name: CreateFlowOrchestrationInstRelatedObj
recordCreates.label: Create Flow Orchestration Instance Related Object

recordCreates.description: Creates a Flow Orchestration Instance Related Object with Party Profile as the RelatedObject and status as In Progress.
recordCreates.name: CreateFlowOrchestrationInstRelatedObj2
recordCreates.label: Create Flow Orchestration Instance Related Object

recordCreates.description: Creates a Flow Orchestration Instance Related Object with Party Profile as the RelatedObject and status as In Progress.
recordCreates.name: CreateFlowOrchestrationInstRelatedObj3
recordCreates.label: Create Flow Orchestration Instance Related Object

recordCreates.description: Creates a Flow Orchestration Instance Related Object with Party Profile as the RelatedObject and status as In Progress.
recordCreates.name: CreateFlowOrchestrationInstRelatedObj4
recordCreates.label: Create Flow Orchestration Instance Related Object

recordCreates.description: Creates a Party Profile record if the Applicant has an Account with the Account Type as Customer and doesn't already have a Party Profile record.
recordCreates.name: CreatePartyProfile
recordCreates.label: Create Party Profile

recordCreates.description: Creates a Party Profile record if it’s not already created for the existing customer.
recordCreates.name: CreatePartyProfile2
recordCreates.label: Create Party Profile

recordCreates.description: Create Party Profile record for Applicant who is an existing customer but no active party profile.
recordCreates.name: CreatePartyProfile3
recordCreates.label: Create Party Profile

recordLookups.description: Gets the Party Profile record for the account selected by the user in the AddApplicants element, and if the Next Profile Review Date is on or after today's date.
recordLookups.name: GetActivePartyProfile
recordLookups.label: Get Active Party Profile

recordLookups.description: Gets the Application Form record whose ID matches the ID of the Application form record passed into the flow.
recordLookups.name: GetApplicationForm
recordLookups.label: Get Application Form

recordLookups.description: Gets the Lead record associated with the Application Form record that’s being onboarded.
recordLookups.name: GetLeadRecord
recordLookups.label: Get Lead Record

recordUpdates.description: Updates the stage of the Application Form record to In Progress.
recordUpdates.name: UpdateApplicationForm
recordUpdates.label: Update Application Form

screens.description: Allows the user to view the Lead record details returned by the GetLead elements and decide if more applicants are needed.
screens.name: AddAdditonalApplicants
screens.label: Add Additional Applicants

screens.description: Allows the users to provide applicant details.
screens.name: AddApplicants
screens.label: Add Applicants

screens.description: Displays a message to the user that application form onboarding is already in progress.
screens.name: OnboardingInProgress
screens.label: Onboarding In Progress

fields.name: ApplicationFormInitiated
fields.fieldText: The onboarding for the Application Form is already in progress. ﻿

screens.description: Allows users to select the product associated with the application form.
screens.name: SelectApplicationFormProduct
screens.label: Select Application Form Product

variables.description: Stores the collection of applicant records.
variables.name: applicantsRecordCollection

variables.description: The ID of the Application Form record passed into the flow.
variables.name: applicationFormId

variables.description: Stores the Application Form Product record.
variables.name: ApplicationFormProduct

variables.description: Stores the name of the Application Form Product record.
variables.name: applicationFormProductName

variables.description: Stores the error message if an exception occurs during flow execution.
variables.name: ErrorMessage

variables.description: Stores a boolean value that indicates whether additional applicants are needed to onboard the application form.
variables.name: HasAdditionalApplicants

variables.description: Stores a boolean value that indicates whether the flow execution failed.
variables.name: isFlowFailed

variables.description: Stores the ID of the Party Profile record returned from the CreatePartyProfile element.
variables.name: PartyProfileId

variables.description: Stores the ID of the Product associated with the Application Form record.
variables.name: ProductId

variables.description: Stores the ID of the Party Profile record that was created by CreatePartyProfile element.
variables.name: TempPartyProfileId
